title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 3128/93 of 11 November 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2420/92 temporarily suspending the Common Customs Tariff duties on imports of certain mixtures of residues of the maize starch industry and of residues from the extraction of maize germ oil obtained by wet milling
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 3128/93 of 11 November 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2420/92 temporarily suspending the Common Customs Tariff duties on imports of certain mixtures of residues of the maize starch industry and of residues from the  extraction of maize germ oil obtained by wet milling
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 2420/92, '30 September 1993' shall be replaced by '30 June 1994'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 October 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 November 1993.
For the Council
The President
R. URBAIN
(1) OJ No L 237, 20. 8. 1992, p. 14. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1993/93 (OJ No L 182, 24. 7. 1993, p. 14).
